select
from domain d where d.status = 0 and ( exists ( select ur.role_id from user_role ur, role r where ur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and r.status = 0 and r.domain_id = d.id and r.id = ur.role_id ) or exists ( select gr.role_id from grp_role gr, role r, grp_path gp, grp g, user_grp ug where gr.grp_id = gp.ancestor and gp.descendant = g.id and g.status = 0 and g.id = ug.grp_id and ug.type = 0 and ug.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and r.id = gr.role_id and r.domain_id = d.id and r.status = 0 ) )
